title: Remove endorsement fields from UserType GraphQL type
description:
Edit `src/backend/app/graphql/types/user.py` to remove:
1. The `_endorsements` private field from the UserType class
2. The `endorsements` property/resolver method
3. The `EndorsementType` import
4. Any endorsement conversion logic in the `from_model` class method
Ensure UserType compiles and resolves all other fields correctly.
acceptance_criteria:
- No `_endorsements` field in UserType
- No `endorsements` property/resolver
- No `EndorsementType` import
- No endorsement logic in `from_model`
- UserType compiles successfully
- GraphQL schema introspection does not include endorsements field on User
